snippet.title: Blood Bowl 3 - Official Season 4 Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Blood Bowl 3 is a PvP sports action strategy RPG developed by Cyanide Studio. Players will play true fantasy football with the latest board game rules and new content. Season 4: Wood Elf has arrived to the game bringing a new faction, the Wood Elves, to compete for the win and the glory. Season 4: Wood Elf for Blood Bowl 3 is available now for PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.
